message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet all your needs and expectations. I believe it's worth every penny of its $15000 value to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $14500 for the product.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your input and understand your perspective. While I'm committed to ensuring both parties are satisfied, I must respectfully decline the counteroffer. Our current asking price is $14500. I believe this reflects the value the product holds for you. Let's work towards closing the deal at this agreed-upon price.
I understand that you're committed to the value of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $14500. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $14000. This is my final offer for now.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to discuss this further. After careful consideration, I'm willing to negotiate closer to your suggested price. My counteroffer is $14250 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement that benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $14000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13800. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if it's not accepted.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm grateful for your continued engagement in this discussion. My counteroffer is $14000 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you while also providing a reasonable profit for us. I hope this proposal will lead to a mutually beneficial outcome.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $13900. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product holds for me.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. My counteroffer is $13950 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you while also providing a reasonable profit for us. I hope this proposal will lead to a mutually beneficial outcome.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $13900, but I'm not willing to go any higher. This is my final offer. If it's not accepted, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
